citation_details.title: Effects of working memory span training on top-down attentional asymmetry at both neural and behavioral levels
citation_details.author: Y Li, X Chen, Q Zhang, et al.
citation_details.abstract: The leftward asymmetry of the visual field and posterior brain regions, a feature of the  normal attention process, can be strengthened by brain stimulation, eg administering alpha
citation_details.short_author: Y Li, X Chen, Q Zhang, et al.
